english.segment1: {Verse 1}. Lord you are faithful in all you're ways. Lord you are loving every day. Just to have you're presence is so great. Lord you're word I will obey
english.segment2: {Chorus}. Like David I'll dance. Write a song if I can ya, ya. Like Noah I'll obey. Though it seems theres no way. I'll praise you anyway
english.segment3: {Verse 2}. Oh Lord of my salvation. I was headed down the road of destruction. But I've been redemmed through you're son jesus. and forever I'll receive you're instuctions
english.segment5: {Bridge} (4x). Lord You are holy. Lord you are worthy. In you're eyes I want to be pleasing
english.segment6: (repeat this entire section 2x). Ya, ya(4x). I will make a joyful noise. Ya, Ya (2x)
english.segment7: And with a praise on my lips and your. word in my heart, I know you'll never depart.
english.segment8: (repeat this entire section 2x). HA-LE-LU-JAH!(2X). I will make a joyful noise. HA-LE-LU-JAH
english.segment9: And with a praise on my lips and your. word in my heart, I know you'll never depart, because you love me that much and i'll never understand that great love and your touch keeps me warm i know it's you that puts me through.(END)
